name: ░▒▌AwesomeBar Popup▐▒░
description:
Firefox: Styles the Awesomebar (url-bar popup) menu to look more native (Windows 8), compact and beautiful. Autoresizes, so scroll-bars are history! Do give feedback on improvements, etc. If you really like it, suggest it as a default for Firefox?

May require restart.
additional_info: • *NEW* for Firefox 48+ use style 128948!!! • Use with style 39995 for best effect. • Recomended on firefox 4+; for pre3.6 versions of firefox use style 17054 • Kudos to user 142430 for the one-liner implementation • If you like it please think to donate a small sum.

discussions.name: You fixed one of many Firefox's messy, ugly inconsistencies!
How to change hover item color in Awesome Bar Popup ?
